  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create(long lessonId, List<Long> accountsId, Connection conn) throws AppException
      Creates multiple attendance records for accounts attending a given lesson. The default value is used for attendance state (false).
      Parameters:
      lessonId - The ID of the lesson for which attendance is being recorded
      accountsId - List of account IDs to mark in the lesson
      conn - Active database connection to execute the query
      Throws:
      AppException - If there's any error during the database operation

    • setAttendance

      public void setAttendance(long lessonId, long accountId, boolean attended, Connection conn) throws AppException
      Updates the attendance status for a specific account in a given lesson.
      Parameters:
      lessonId - The ID of the lesson for which attendance is being updated
      accountId - The ID of the account whose attendance is being updated
      attended - The new attendance status (true if attended, false if not)
      conn - Active database connection to execute the query
      Throws:
      AppException - If there's any error during the database operation
